definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: [[שִׁיתָה מוֹרָה לָהֶם]] Ps 9:21, prob. appoint (Ho 6:11) terror (i.e. some awe-inspiring exhibition of power) for them Thes SS RV Ew De Hu Pe Che after Mas Targum Aq Jer ([[מוֹרָה]] a variation of or prob. error for [[מוֹרָא]]); poss. set them a teacher, master Bae after LXX Vulgate SyrVer [[מוֹרֶה]], nomoqe/thn; neither altogether satisfactory.
